message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this product and believe it would be valuable to you. I'm offering it to you for $140. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $110. Can we meet in the middle?
I appreciate your interest, Bob. While $110 is a bit too low for me, I'm willing to come down to $130. This offer reflects the true value of the product.
I appreciate your flexibility, but $115 is the highest I'm willing to go. Can we meet at this price?
